mapper.select: SELECT su.nickname, tpi.invigilator_id, tc.id AS classroom_id, tc.classroom_name, tpi.invigilate_status, tpi.id, tpi.exam_password, tc.exam_type, tel.detailed_address, tel.location_name from ted_plan_invigilate tpi LEFT JOIN ted_classroom tc ON tpi.classroom_id = tc.id AND tc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON tpi.invigilator_id = su.id LEFT JOIN ted_location_classroom tlc ON tc.id = tlc.classroom_id AND tlc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ted_exam_location tel ON tlc.location_id = tel.id AND tel.is_deleted = 0 where tpi.exam_plan_id = #{planId} AND tpi.is_deleted = 0

SELECT su.id, su.nickname FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = su.id AND sur.role_id = #{invigilatorRole} JOIN ted_exam_plan cur_tep ON cur_tep.id = #{planId} JOIN ted_project cur_tp ON cur_tp.id = cur_tep.exam_project_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ted_plan_invigilate tpi JOIN ted_exam_plan tep ON tep.id = tpi.exam_plan_id AND tep.id != #{planId} AND tep.is_final_confirmed IN (1, 2) AND tep.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime}) AND tep.start_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{startTime}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHERE tpi.invigilator_id = su.id AND tpi.invigilate_status = 0 AND tpi.is_deleted = 0) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ted_user_qualification tuq WHERE tuq.user_id = su.id AND tuq.category_id = cur_tp.category_id AND tuq.is_deleted = 0);
